column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hey. I like this ramen place. I love me some thick noodles and broth mmm. Usually
column2: i just get something random and it always ends up tasting great. Personally
column3: just wished there was more meat! Great ramen
column5: and solid atmosphere.Needless to say... check this place out if you like ramen. Like now.
